scenarios.name: Create restaurant business
scenarios.prompt: insert into bizes id = biz_waitlist_uc19 name = ExclusiveBistro slug = exclusive-bistro-uc19 status = active timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create location
scenarios.prompt: insert into locations id = loc_uc19 biz_id = biz_waitlist_uc19 name = MainDining slug = main-dining timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create waitlist queue
scenarios.prompt: insert into queues id = q_waitlist_uc19 biz_id = biz_waitlist_uc19 location_id = loc_uc19 name = DinnerWaitlist slug = dinner-waitlist strategy = priority status = active is_self_join_enabled = true

scenarios.name: Create customer user
scenarios.prompt: insert into users id = usr_waitlist_001_uc19 email = customer1.uc19@example.com name = PriorityCustomer status = active

scenarios.name: Create waitlist entry
scenarios.prompt: insert into queue_entries id = qe_001_uc19 biz_id = biz_waitlist_uc19 queue_id = q_waitlist_uc19 customer_user_id = usr_waitlist_001_uc19 status = waiting priority_score = 100 estimated_wait_min = 45

scenarios.name: Auto-offer queue entry
scenarios.prompt: update queue_entries set status = offered offered_at = 2026-02-22T18:00:00Z offer_expires_at = 2026-02-22T20:00:00Z where id = qe_001_uc19 and biz_id = biz_waitlist_uc19

scenarios.name: Record auto-offer event
scenarios.prompt: insert into queue_events id = qev_offer_uc19 biz_id = biz_waitlist_uc19 queue_entry_id = qe_001_uc19 event_type = offered actor_user_id = usr_waitlist_001_uc19 event_at = 2026-02-22T18:00:00Z

scenarios.name: Create queue ticket
scenarios.prompt: insert into queue_tickets id = qt_uc19_001 biz_id = biz_waitlist_uc19 queue_id = q_waitlist_uc19 queue_entry_id = qe_001_uc19 ticket_number = 1001 status = issued issued_at = 2026-02-22T17:55:00Z

scenarios.name: Create wait prediction
scenarios.prompt: insert into wait_time_predictions id = wtp_uc19_001 biz_id = biz_waitlist_uc19 queue_id = q_waitlist_uc19 queue_entry_id = qe_001_uc19 model_type = heuristic generated_at = 2026-02-22T18:00:00Z horizon_min = 45 estimated_wait_min = 45 p50_wait_min = 40 p90_wait_min = 55
